availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William O. Barbour (Bullitt County, Ky, resident )

body.p: Bullitt County, Kentucky, resident. Married to Elizabeth J. Troutman Barbour in Bullitt County, Kentucky, on May 11, 1856. Father of John Gardner Barbour. Resident of Bullitt County in 1859. Resident of Bullitt County in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Bullitt County Marriages, Film #000482690, p. 185
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records – Microfilm (1847-1911), KDLA, Film # 994029: Bullitt County Births, 1859, p. 2 of 9 of microfilm (accessed via Ancestry.com).
Find A Grave, “Willie Barber (unknown-1864)," Memorial # 100674706, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/100674706/willie-barber (accessed April 1, 2021).
